title: Cheese Berry Cake
steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
Pour batter into greased cake pans.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Apple Pie
steps: Peel and slice apples, then mix with sugar and cinnamon.
Line pie dish with pastry, add apple mixture, and cover with top pastry.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

title: Chocolate Cupcake
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl, then add wet ingredients and mix until smooth.
Pour batter into lined cupcake trays.
Bake for 18-20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
